original_title: Sigur Rós: Live At Norður og Niður (Harpa Concert Hall Reykjavík, Island)
overview: 127 shows over 19 months in 37 countries on 5 continents - it’s been, as they say, a long strange trip, and tonight it comes to an end with the final show, where else, but in the band's hometown of reykjavík, as the climax of their norður og niður 4-day festival extravaganza. and you can watch it all, live in real time at 8pm gmt, saturday december 30th 2017, via our homepage. the future is unwritten, so be present. over and out.
title: Sigur Rós: Live At Norður og Niður (Harpa Concert Hall Reykjavík, Island)
